verses.verse: <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign<s%> when he was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H29>Abijah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah.<s%>
He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> according to all that <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

He in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and repaired <S%H2388>them.<s%>
He brought <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and gathered them <S%H622>together<s%> into the <S%H7339>broad<s%> place on the <S%H4217>east,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>them,<s%> "Listen to <S%H3881>me,<s%> you Levites! Now <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H6942>yourselves,<s%> and sanctify the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and carry <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H5079>filthiness<s%> out of the holy <S%H6944>place.<s%>

For our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H4603>trespassed,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5437>him,<s%> and have turned away their <S%H6440>faces<s%> from the <S%H4908>habitation<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5414>turned<s%> their <S%H6203>backs.<s%>

Also they have shut <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H197>porch,<s%> and put <S%H3518>out<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> and have not <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> nor <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H7110>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was on <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and he has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them to be <S%H2189>tossed<s%> back and <S%H8047>forth,<s%> to be an astonishment, and a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> as you <S%H7200>see<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H1>For,<s%> behold, our fathers have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> and our <S%H802>wives<s%> are in captivity for <S%H7628>this.<s%>

Now it is in my <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> may turn away from <S%H7725>us.<s%>

My <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H7952>don't<s%> be negligent <S%H3068>now;<s%> for Yahweh has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8334>him,<s%> to minister to <S%H8334>him,<s%> and that you should be his ministers, and burn <S%H6999>incense.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> <S%H4287>Mahath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6022>Amasai,<s%> and <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites;<s%> and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> <S%H7027>Kish<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5660>Abdi,<s%> and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3094>Jehallelel;<s%> and of the <S%H1649>Gershonites,<s%> <S%H3098>Joah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2155>Zimmah,<s%> and <S%H5731>Eden<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3098>Joah;<s%>

and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H469>Elizaphan,<s%> <S%H8113>Shimri<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeuel;<s%> and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> and <S%H4983>Mattaniah;<s%>
and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> <S%H3171>Jehuel<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei;<s%> and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

They <S%H622>gathered<s%> their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H935>themselves,<s%> and went <S%H4687>in,<s%> according to the commandment of the <S%H4428>king<s%> by the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in to the inner <S%H6441>part<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> <S%H3318>it,<s%> and brought out all the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> into the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6901>took<s%> <S%H3318>it,<s%> to carry it out <S%H2351>abroad<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron.<s%>

Now they <S%H2490>began<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify,<s%> and on the <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they to the <S%H197>porch<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> and on the <S%H8337>sixteenth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> they made an <S%H3615>end.<s%>

Then they <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H6441>in<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> within the <S%H559>palace,<s%> and said, "We have <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> with all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and the <S%H7979>table<s%> of show <S%H4635>bread,<s%> with all its <S%H3627>vessels.<s%>

Moreover all the <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> which <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> in his <S%H4438>reign<s%> threw <S%H2186>away<s%> when he <S%H4604>trespassed,<s%> have we <S%H3559>prepared<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified;<s%> and <S%H6440>behold,<s%> they are before the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

Then <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> arose <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> male <S%H5795>goats,<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> for the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> and for the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> and for <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> He <S%H559>commanded<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to <S%H5927>offer<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

So they <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H1241>bulls,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6901>received<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and they <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> they <S%H7819>killed<s%> also the <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

They brought <S%H5066>near<s%> the male <S%H8163>goats<s%> for the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H6951>assembly;<s%> and they <S%H5564>laid<s%> their hands on <S%H3027>them:<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H2398>them,<s%> and they made a sin offering with their <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> that the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the sin <S%H5930>offering<s%> should be made for all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> with stringed <S%H5035>instruments,<s%> and with <S%H3658>harps,<s%> according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2374>seer,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet;<s%> for the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> was <S%H3027>of<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>
The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> with the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets.<s%>

<S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> to <S%H5927>offer<s%> the burnt <S%H5927>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> <S%H6256>When<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H2490>began,<s%> the <S%H7892>song<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> <S%H2689>also,<s%> and the trumpets, together with the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> <S%H3027>of<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

All the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H7812>worshiped,<s%> and the <S%H7892>singers<s%> <S%H7891>sang,<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpeters<s%> <S%H2690>sounded;<s%> all this continued until the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> was <S%H3615>finished.<s%>
When they had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5927>offering,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and all who were <S%H4672>present<s%> with him <S%H3766>bowed<s%> themselves and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to sing <S%H1984>praises<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H2374>seer.<s%> They sang <S%H1984>praises<s%> with <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> and they bowed their <S%H6915>heads<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>

Then <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"Now<s%> you have <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> yourselves to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> come <S%H5066>near<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and thank <S%H8426>offerings<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>" The <S%H6951>assembly<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and thank <S%H8426>offerings;<s%> and as many as were of a <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> brought burnt <S%H5930>offerings.<s%>

The <S%H4557>number<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> which the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> was <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H1241>bulls,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3532>lambs:<s%> all these were for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The consecrated <S%H6944>things<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>

But the <S%H3548>priests<s%> were too <S%H4592>few,<s%> so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6584>flay<s%> all the burnt <S%H5930>offerings:<s%> therefore their <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H2388>helped<s%> <S%H4399>them,<s%> until the work was <S%H3615>ended,<s%> and until the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H3881>themselves;<s%> for the Levites were more <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> themselves than the <S%H3548>priests.<s%>

Also the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> were in <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and with the drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> for every burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%> So the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was set in <S%H3559>order.<s%>

<S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> because of that which <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H5971>people:<s%> for the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was done <S%H6597>suddenly.<s%>
